review: This device works real well once you get it working right. I'm a certified PC Technician and very electronically inclined.It still took a week to get it working right. I gave 3 stars because there isn't much in the way of documentation (online or written). The support forums don't really have helpful people in it. I feel bad for those that run into problems and don't have a state of mind that allows for troubleshooting and fixing things. Luckily for me, I can "figure out" just about any gadget. If you purchase this item just be prepared that we are not in "a perfect world" and things go wrong that you'll have to "figure" out by yourself.
